title: Kevin de Bruyne news: Manchester City player's Premier League career in stats
title_page: Kevin de Bruyne news: Manchester City player's Premier League career in stats  - BBC Sport
maintext:
Undoubtedly one of Manchester City's greatest ever midfielders, Kevin de Bruyne has made 413 appearances for the club since his arrival in the summer of 2015, scoring 106 times and providing 174 assists in all competitions.
According to Opta, since his arrival at City, no player has created more chances (827), more big chances (193) or provided more assists (117) in the Premier League.
When comparing accolades to other greats of the games, De Bruyne has the joint most Premier League player of the season awards with two - alongside Thierry Henry, Cristiano Ronaldo and Nemanja Vidic.
He is level with Henry for the most assists in a single Premier League season, producing 20 in the 2019-20 campaign.
The Belgian also has most Premier League playmaker awards for the player with the most assists, with three (2017-18, 2019-20 and 2022-23).
In fact, he has the second most assists in the competition's history with 118, behind only Ryan Giggs (162).
